titles.title: Expressing the sense of the Congress with respect to the railroad retirement system.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

committee.name: House Committee on Energy and Commerce

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Transportation and Hazardous Materials.

bill.summary: 4/20/1994--Introduced. Expresses the sense of the Congress that: (1) continued Federal commitment to the railroad retirement system is essential to assure the integrity of railroad retirees' benefits; and (2) preservation of such system's present structure, including the administrative framework of the Railroad Retirement Board, is necessary to fulfill the Federal Government's time-honored responsibility.
